name: RedGhostBlue
description:
Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 in about 2 days.

An army of ghosts is coming for you!
Survive as much as possible!

Ghosts die when they reach a doorway of the same color.
Ghosts are only visible when in a corridor of the same color.
Click on the boxes to switch colors.

Try to survive at least one minute!
